incident: Due to a rescue operation at Schwedenplatz U, Line 2 was rerouted between Julius-Raab-Platz and Karmeliterplatz via Schwedenbrücke, missing the Schwedenplatz U and Gredlerstraße stops.
Due to a police operation at Taborstraße 39, Line 2 was rerouted between Heinestraße and Julius-Raab-Platz via Lines O and 1.

station: Ring, Volkstheater U to Julius Raab Platz
incident: Due to a police operation at Ring, Volkstheater, Line 2 was rerouted via the route of Line 1.
